item.title: FT Most Read: Monday, January 27, 2025 at 12:30 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Tech stocks tumble as China’s DeepSeek sows doubts about AI spending
2. US pauses tariffs on Colombia after deal on deportations
3. Trump ridicules Denmark and insists US will take Greenland
4. Trump proposes ‘clean out’ of Gaza population
5. Lina Khan warns of ‘catastrophic consequences’ if Trump gives free hand to private equity
item.guid: FT Most Read: Monday, January 27, 2025 at 12:30 PM UTC
